title: Django Kill - Guilio Questi 1967 / DVDR
description:
Django Kill AKA ...If you live, shoot! (Se sei vivo spara) - Guilio Questi 1967 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0062082/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0062082/</a>

In this, in my opinon one of the best Spaghetti Westerns, Tomas Milian (Run Man run, Four of the Apocalypse...) stars as a half-breed bandit double-crossed and left for dead who rises from the grave to seek his revenge. But when his quest leads to a bizarre town called The Unhappy Place, he is plunged into an odyssey of gruesome torture, graphic violence and relentless sexual depravity. This is the landmark movie that fans and critics still consider to be the strangest and most controversial Spaghetti Western ever made.

A hallucinatory, violent and surreal tale of greed, corruption, perversion and beyond...

Picture: 2.35:1 WS
Sound/subs: English or Italian with Enlish subs
Format: NTSC
Extras:
# Django, Tell! - Interviews with Co-Writer/Director Guilio Questi & Tomas Milian
# Theatrical Trailer
# Poster & Still Gallery 

Encoded with DVD-Shrink.
